capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. It sounds like a pretty straightforward statement, but I suppose you never know what someone might be thinking! Anyway, yeah, Dudley is definitely 11.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never met anyone that young before, valeria, tell me more about yourself!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that I can confirm.
capsules_submitted.reply: amazing! so, harry and dudley are both eleven years old.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old. That's still pretty young, right? (sentiment: neutral)

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's family background and it seems pretty clear that he does indeed come from a lineage of wizards.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of you before, valeria, but i'm so excited to learn more about hagrid   who is he?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You're talking about Hagrid's teeth. I'm pretty sure he lost them to those hunters, right? It was a pretty intense situation, and I can see why it would be a traumatic experience for him. (CONFIRM)
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of hunters' teeth before, valeria   what's that all about?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hunters have been known to collect all sorts of things, but I'm not sure if they'd be interested in Hagrid's teeth. I mean, it's not like they're exactly rare or valuable, is it? But, I suppose if you're looking for a unique addition to your collection, Hagrid's teeth might just fit the bill.

You know, I've always been a bit concerned about Hagrid's teeth. I mean, it's not exactly something you'd want to see in a gamekeeper, right? Hunters-teeth just seems like a pretty ominous thing to have lying around. I'm not sure what kind of certainty there is that he actually has them, but the sentiment around it is definitely negative - it sounds like a pretty dark and scary thing.

You know, I've always been a bit concerned about Hagrid's teeth. I mean, it's not exactly something you'd want to think about when you're talking to someone, but... (pausing for a moment)  Hunters have teeth, and they can be pretty sharp. I'm fairly certain that Hagrid has had some issues with them in the past, and I wouldn't be surprised if he's still got some problems with them now.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is the ancestry of hagrid?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry about Hagrid's family background and he mentioned that Hagrid is a wizard. I completely agree with him, by the way. I've seen Hagrid cast spells and defend himself against dark magic, so it's clear that he has a strong magical heritage.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of product did hagrid export?
